summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Tuesday, July 30, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and overtime for correctional officers and administrative personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the staffing and operational environment at the MCC, the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held, around the time of his incarceration and death.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer on the roster, with assignments and status changes noted (e.g., 'INTERNAL #2 Thomas, M OT (NC)').

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed under 'Back Page Categories' with 'DAY OFF' status.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 30, 2019.
The roster details shift patterns (e.g., 07:00-16:00), posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, VISIT), and staff statuses (e.g., Sick Leave, Annual Leave, Day Off).
It lists two named correctional officers: Thomas, M and Noel, T.
The document includes administrative data such as overtime/comptime occurrences and total staff counts (109 Correctional Services Staff, 6 Non-Correctional Services Staff).
The roster shows the operational structure and staffing levels of the MCC, the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was detained.
